Security Research

In-depth analysis of cybersecurity threats, vulnerabilities, and emerging attack vectors through responsible research practices.

Latest Research

Our research focuses on identifying, analyzing, and responsibly disclosing security vulnerabilities.

VULNERABILITY ANALYSIS

Published: September 15, 2024

Cross-Site Scripting Patterns in Modern Web Applications

A comprehensive analysis of XSS vulnerabilities found in contemporary web applications, including novel attack vectors and mitigation strategies. This research examines 500+ applications and identifies common patterns that lead to XSS vulnerabilities.

XSS Web Security Vulnerability Research
Read Full Article
CRYPTOGRAPHIC ANALYSIS

Published: August 28, 2024

Weak Cryptographic Implementations in IoT Devices

An investigation into cryptographic weaknesses found in popular IoT devices, revealing implementation flaws that could lead to device compromise. This study covers 200+ IoT devices across various manufacturers.

IoT Security Cryptography Hardware Analysis

Our Research Methodology

Ethical Standards

  • • Responsible disclosure practices
  • • No harm to systems or data
  • • Coordination with affected parties
  • • Compliance with legal frameworks

Research Process

  • • Systematic vulnerability assessment
  • • Proof-of-concept development
  • • Impact analysis and documentation
  • • Mitigation strategy development
